379c162aac12eca2deca690287b54ad270cc2e40.shortBio: Chet leads the Android Toolkit, working on animations, graphics, UI, performance, and anything else that puts the pixels on the screen...
379c162aac12eca2deca690287b54ad270cc2e40.name: Chet Haase
379c162aac12eca2deca690287b54ad270cc2e40.bio: Chet leads the Android Toolkit, working on animations, graphics, UI, performance, and anything else that puts the pixels on the screen. And sometimes, just sometimes, he takes a break from comedy to give a technical talk.

4a7ca4c16cbe81a612bf3011a3d3439f85408103.shortBio: Romain works on 3D real-time graphics and Kotlin on the Android team at Google. He previously managed the UI toolkit team and the graphics team...
4a7ca4c16cbe81a612bf3011a3d3439f85408103.name: Romain Guy
4a7ca4c16cbe81a612bf3011a3d3439f85408103.bio: Romain works on 3D real-time graphics and Kotlin on the Android team at Google. He previously managed the UI toolkit team and the graphics team.

a6e2fe8e-80ac-4ce2-a3db-a03b41ba8775.name: Anita Singh
a6e2fe8e-80ac-4ce2-a3db-a03b41ba8775.bio: Anita Singh is a Senior Android Engineer at Blinkist who recently moved to Berlin from Silicon Valley, where she lead mobile development at an early-stage startup. She is passionate about building beautiful and responsive apps, and making Android development more approachable for everybody.

f2c947c4-393b-4476-b6b3-b2507e6137dc.name: David LÃ¡zaro
f2c947c4-393b-4476-b6b3-b2507e6137dc.bio: David is a Spanish Android engineer, currently working at Blinkist. He has been focused on Android development since 2012 and has always been working for small product-based companies. He is interested in creating high-quality user experiences and delivering real value in the apps he works on. He also loves music and playing the guitar in his spare time.
